## GridColumn interface

Basic grid column definition

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface GridColumn 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [id](./grid.gridcolumn.id.md) | <code>string</code> | Unique identifier of column |
|  [title](./grid.gridcolumn.title.md) | <code>string</code> | Title of column that is displayed in grid header |
|  [visible](./grid.gridcolumn.visible.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Indication that this column is visible in grid |
